step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with a comfortable position. Keep your arms reaching overhead and fingers spread wide.
You're doing well stretching your arms overhead. Remember to exhale as you relax and extend your arms.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Excellent work extending your arms back overhead and exhaling. Continue to relax your muscles as you do this.
You're completing the repetitions well. Ensure you are fully stretching your arms overhead and relaxing completely on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms stretched overhead with fingers open, and then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Breathe in as you tighten, and exhale as you relax.
